kvhc.models

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • kvhc.models.Channel

  • public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object
    The Channel class manages a channel containing a number of steps and a sound to play whenever one of its step is played.
    Author:
    kvhc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Channel()
      Constructor for an empty channel.
      Channel(Sound sound)
      Constructor for a channel with a sound.
      Channel(Sound sound, int steps)
      Constructor for a channel with a sound and a specific number of steps.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Channel

        public Channel()
        Constructor for an empty channel. Sets the Sound of the channel to null.

      • Channel

        public Channel(Sound sound)
        Constructor for a channel with a sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound of the channel

      • Channel

        public Channel(Sound sound,
       int steps)
        Constructor for a channel with a sound and a specific number of steps.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound of the Channel
        steps - the number of steps the channel should consist of

    • Method Detail

      • isStepActive

        public boolean isStepActive(int step)
        Returns true if the step is active.
        Parameters:
        step - the step to check
        Returns:
        true if the step is active, false otherwise

      • clearAllSteps

        public void clearAllSteps()
        Resets all steps. Sets them inactive and with default volume.

      • setSound

        public void setSound(Sound sound)
        Sets the Sound of the Channel.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to be used

      • getSound

        public Sound getSound()
        Method that returns the sound of the step.
        Returns:
        the Sound of the step

      • toggleStep

        public boolean toggleStep(int step)
        Toggles a step between active or inactive. If it's active, it is set to inactive and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        step - what step to toggle
        Returns:
        whether it's active or not after the operation

      • setStep

        public void setStep(int step,
           boolean active)
        Sets a specific step to active or not.
        Parameters:
        step - what step to set
        active - boolean whether the step should be active or not

      • setStep

        public void setStep(int step,
           boolean active,
           float velocity)
        Sets a specific step to active or not active and with a specific velocity ("volume")
        Parameters:
        step - what step
        active - boolean whether the step should be active or not
        velocity - velocity ("volume") of the step, between 0 and 1

      • getVolumeLeft

        public float getVolumeLeft(int step)
        Get the left speakers volume of a separate step in the channel Is computed by multiplying the channel volume by the steps velocity and the left panning.
        Parameters:
        step - what step
        Returns:
        a float between 0 and 1

      • getChannelVolume

        public float getChannelVolume()
        This method returns the volume set to this channel
        Returns:
        The raw volume of this channel without caring about velocity of the next step or if the channel is muted

      • getVolumeRight

        public float getVolumeRight(int step)
        Get the right speakers volume of a separate step in the channel Is computed by multiplying the channel volume by the steps velocity ("volume")
        Parameters:
        step - what step
        Returns:
        a float between 0 and 1

      • getVolume

        public float getVolume()
        Returns the volume of the Channel. If the Channel is muted it returns zero
        Returns:
        a float between 0 and 1

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(float volume)
        Sets the volume of the channel.
        Parameters:
        volume - A float between 0 and 1

      • resizeBy

        public void resizeBy(int resizeByAmount)
        Resizes the number of Steps in the Channel. resizeByAmount may be a positive or negative number.
        Parameters:
        resizeByAmount - the number of steps to be added or removed

      • getSteps

        public java.util.List<Step> getSteps()
        Method for getting n list with all the Channels Steps
        Returns:
        a list with all the Channels Steps

      • multiStepVelocitySpike

        public void multiStepVelocitySpike(int stepid)
        Sets the step with given stepids velocity to 100%, the two neighbours to 70% and the neighbours neighbours to 30%. Activates the mentioned steps.
        Parameters:
        stepid - the center step of the spike
